attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Photographers have been classed as the criminals and we need this to be stopped,
photographers have been taking photos for decades.

we need as many signings as possible to get this unofficial crime abbolished.

contact me @>>>>gorillaz180@hotmail.com


Oh and if your wondering i am 15 years of age and GLOBALPANT = Global Photographers Are Not Terrorists.

rejection.details: It is not clear in your petition what action you are requesting from the Prime Minister. Please resumbit your petition accordingly.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
